description.value: A creature damaged by the path maiden's hand Strike must succeed at a Will save to avoid becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 2} on a critical failure).

publication.title: Pathfinder #199: To Bloom Below the Web
